original_text:
I applied my heart to what I observed
    and learned a lesson from what I saw:
korean_text: 내가 보고 생각이 깊었고 내가 보고 훈계를 받았노라

sentences.original_text: I applied my heart to what I observed
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 본 것에 내 마음을 적용하였고

sentences.original_text: and learned a lesson from what I saw:
